questions.question_text: Which step is required to configure permissions for a vSphere with Tanzu namespace?

choices.D: Define users and groups in vCenter SSO

questions.question_text:
An administrator needs to install certificates for the VMware Cloud Foundation components. They need to be fully automated and not require additional configuration.
Which two certificate authority types meet these requirements? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: DE
Fully Automated by VMware Cloud Foundation:
- Microsoft CA
- OpenSSL (internal only) CA
Reference: VCF (Planning, Management, Operations V4.3) page 370
did you do the exam based on this dump?

choices.E: DHCP on overlay network in each site

questions.question_text:
An administrator reviews all requirements in the environment before deploying a stretched cluster.
Which two requirements must be ready? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BE
each site with it´s own networks, DHCP on the host overlay network in each site, RTT <= 5 milliseconds, and networks must be streteched across both sides (mgmt network, edge uplink, and nsx overlay vlans). Entreprise license is a must

Selected Answer: BE
B and E for sure

Selected Answer: AC
vSAN and vMotion are part of the requirement for MGMT WLD.

Selected Answer: AC
in management domain, you must have vsan and vmotion network.
A & C are correct

questions.question_text:
Refer to the exhibit.
Review this deployment parameter sheet extract (table):
//IMG//

Which two required VLANs are missing from the table for deploying the workload domain? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is correct.
D is correct. VMware Cloud Foundation: Planning, Management, Operations page 97

Selected Answer: D
Mgmt-RegionA01-VXLAN is used for vRealize Suite WLDs that don´t requiere portability between regions, MGMT-xRegion01-VXLAN is used for vRealize Suite WLDs that requiered portabiltiy ACROSS regions or failover.
Answer is D. Check VMware Cloud Foundation: Planning, Management, Operations

Selected Answer: A
A for Sure
NY-xRegion01-SEG01 is for vRealize Automation
NY-RegionA01-SEG01 is for vRealize Log Insight

REF: https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-Cloud-Foundation/4.5/vcf-admin/GUID-59E5BEE3-B157-426D-A40C-F21171586863.html

choices.C: Only for vRealize Automation Proxy Servers guided deployment
choices.B: For vRealize Suite components which require portability across regions or failover capability
choices.A: Only for vRealize Log Insight guided deployment
choices.D: For vRealize Suite components that do not require portability between regions

questions.question_text:
During the management domain bring-up process two AVN networks (NY-xRegion01-SEG01 and NY-RegionA01-SEG01) are created.
What is NY-RegionA01-SEG01 used for?
